reviewText: This is a must have for Pat Boone fans.he sings many hyms while walking around israel- you will enjoy it!!!
The color, music and scenery is washed out and I didn't bother to watch it all. Should have sent it back but that was too much trouble.
Fantastic!  Great music and scenes from Israel.  Please let's get it back!
We had this DVD before, but it degraded.  It's good to have a new copy.  The music and images are just beautiful.

An excellent Gospel music Journey in the Holy Land with Pat Boone singing. The photography is exceptionally fine, and the program very well planned, and very beautiful.  Highly recommend to anyone interested in the Holy Land and Christian music.
